summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons TRUVIEW report showing money received by inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg # 76318-054) via Western Union from three individuals in July-August 2019, while he was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It also includes contact list reports for two of the senders.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The incarcerated individual (Reg # 76318-054) receiving money via Western Union transfers while in federal custody.

persons.name: Gulnora Tali
persons.context: Sent $200 via Western Union to Jeffrey Epstein on August 7, 2019, and is listed on his outside person contact report.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Sent $300 via Western Union to Jeffrey Epstein on July 31, 2019. Indyke was a long-time attorney and co-executor of Epstein's estate.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Sent $200 via Western Union to Jeffrey Epstein on July 8, 2019, and is listed on his outside person contact report. Kahn was a long-time business manager and co-executor of Epstein's estate.

connections.description: Indyke sent $300 to Epstein via Western Union while Epstein was incarcerated, indicating ongoing financial support.
Kahn sent $200 to Epstein via Western Union while Epstein was incarcerated, indicating ongoing financial support.
Tali sent $200 to Epstein via Western Union while Epstein was incarcerated, indicating a financial connection.
Both were long-time associates of Epstein who sent him money while he was incarcerated and later served as co-executors of his estate.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein received at least $700 in Western Union transfers while incarcerated in July-August 2019.
The money came from three individuals: Gulnora Tali ($200), Darren Indyke ($300), and Richard Kahn ($200).
Darren Indyke and Richard Kahn, who sent money to Epstein, would later become co-executors of his estate after his death.
The Bureau of Prisons maintained detailed TRUVIEW reports tracking inmate financial transactions and outside contacts.
Epstein's inmate registration number was 76318-054, and he was held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York (NYM).
